name: Hell Fist
description:
WELCOME, YOU ARE THE HELL FIST

KILL DEMONS
GATHER SOULS
GAIN POWER PLAY WITH A HEADSET FOR OPTIMAL EXPERIENCE - Controls -

WASD/ZQSD: Move
LEFT CLICK: Hit
SPACE: Jump

When Dash is unlocked:
RIGHT CLICK (hold): Charge dash
RIGHT CLICK (release): Unleash dash

When Ground Attack is unlocked:
CTRL LEFT (when in the air and have sufficent height): Ground attack

ESCAPE: Quit the game
---
When a Hearth spawn, you have 30 seconds to kill it before you die.

Entry for Epic Mega Jam!
